description.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0914 (Root Cause)

valueString.value:
Enter (AP) when ANALYSIS PROCESS is the reason due to:

â€¢ Product or supply failure (reagents, calibrators, QC material)

â€¢ Equipment or instrumentation failure

Enter (IM) when INFORMATION MANAGEMENT is the reason due to:

â€¢ Database or Programming issues

â€¢ Overriding of test results

â€¢ Inaccurate calculations

â€¢ Inaccurate flagging, reference ranges, units of measure

â€¢ Incomplete/inaccurate tran

Enter (L) when LABORATORY is the reason due to:

â€¢ Data Entry error

â€¢ Testing/Technical error

â€¢ Repeat testing causing change to test result

Enter (NA) when NOT-APPLICABLE is the reason due to:

â€¢ If no revisions performed or

â€¢ unable to determine reason for revision

Note: Do not use NA if result code status is not corrected (revised) or if a preliminary release of results with a cor

Enter (PD) when new or changed PLACER DATA information is the reason due to:

â€¢ Changed patient demographics or
